main event: A civilian observed a small red object moving rapidly in the sky, hovering, and then disappearing on July 7, 1956, for a duration of 12 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as small and red,The sighting lasted for 12 minutes,The object was reported to have moved rapidly before hovering,The observer described the object as having a course to and up,The report hints at similarities to a balloon sighting.
